summary: In 2176, a magnetic storm erases all recorded history, including the U.S. Constitution, so, three time travelers are sent back to July 4, 1776, to retrieve the heritage, but end up in 1976's Bicentennial, while being perceived as aliens.
cast: Mark Mothersbaugh|Gerald Casale|Carl Reiner|Nancye Ferguson|David Cassidy|Bob Casale|David Kendrick|Geoff Hoyle|Olivia d'Abo|Jeffrey McDonald|Steve McDonald|Liam O'Brien|Ann Block|Charles Dean|Martin von Haselberg|Brian Routh|Leif Garrett|Moon Unit Zappa|Maud Winchester|Lorri Holt|Jerry Carlton|Tommy Chong|Shelby Chong|Todd A. Rolle|Julie Brown|Michael Jerome West|Rob Reiner|Barbara Bain|Don Novello|Lucas Reiner|Michael McShane|Morgan Upton|Ryan Wallace|Lisa Houston|Leigh French|Iron Eyes Cody|Jack Blessing|Lisa Michelson|Tracy Newman|Gregory Snegoff|Jonathan Stark|Arnold F. Turner|Gigi Vorgan|Sofia Coppola|Ian Davidson|Markus Maguire|Tyrone M Sanders
title: Verano del 76
